thread.title: Comey book compares Trump admin to Mafia organization

title: Comey book compares Trump admin to Mafia organization
text:
Comey book likens Trump to Mob boss Friday, April 13, 2018 - 02:06 
The culture inside the Trump administration reminded fired FBI Director James Comey of his experience prosecuting organized crime organizations, according to excerpts from a new memoir shared by the Washington Post. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The culture inside the Trump administration reminded fired FBI Director James Comey of his experience prosecuting organized crime organizations, according to excerpts from a new memoir shared by the Washington Post.
